name: "Unofficial"HarryPotterFacts
0:
”Alexa ask unofficial harry potter facts to give me a fact”
”let me know about harry potter”
”give me a harry potter fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: unofficial harry potter facts
des: Just ask unofficial harry potter facts "give me a fact" and it will give you a randomized harry potter fact. Use this skill to expand your knowledge of all things in the harry potter world.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
